s: Soma Fabrications is a company that designs and manufactures high-quality bicycle frames and components. Based in San Francisco, California, Soma has been in business since 2002 and has a reputation for producing durable and stylish products that are popular among cycling enthusiasts. Some of the products offered by Soma include steel and titanium frames, forks, handlebars, stem, and other components. In addition to their own brand...
